16 std::pair<double, double> utils::statistics::details::computeCI(
17  double alpha, double mean, double stDev, unsigned int n)
18 {
19  assert(n > 0);
20 
21  std::pair<double, double> p;
22 
23  double tmp = (alpha * (stDev / sqrt((double) n)));
24 
25  p.first = (mean - tmp);
26  p.second = (mean + tmp);
27 
28  return p;
29 }
30 
31 
32 double utils::statistics::details::gamma(double shape, double scale)
33 {
34  if (shape < 1.0)
35  {
36  return (gamma((shape + 1.0), scale)
37  * pow(RandomGen::rand01_open_Uniform(), (1.0 / shape)));
38  }
39 
40  const double d = (shape - (1.0 / 3.0));
41  const double c = (1.0 / sqrt(9.0 * d));
42  double x, v;
43  for (;;)
44  {
45  do
46  {
47  x = RandomGen::rand_Gaussian(0.0, 1.0);
48  v = (1.0 + (c * x));
49  }
50  while (v <= 0.0);
51 
52  v = (v * v * v);
53  const double u = RandomGen::rand01_open_Uniform();
54  const double x2 = (x * x);
55 
56  if (u < (1.0 - (0.0331 * x2 * x2))) { return ((d * v) / scale); }
57  if (log(u) < ((0.5 * x2) + (d * (1.0 - v + log(v)))))
58  return ((d * v) / scale);
59  }
60 }

66 void utils::statistics::sampleDirichlet(
67  unsigned int hTheta, const std::vector<double>& theta,
68  unsigned int hP, std::vector<double>& P,
69  unsigned int n)
70 {
71  assert(n > 0);
72  assert(hTheta + (n - 1) < theta.size());
73  assert(hP + (n - 1) < P.size());
74 
75  double gammaSum = 0.0;
76  double randGamma;
77  bool allZeros = true;
78  for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; i++)
79  {
80  randGamma = utils::statistics::details::gamma(theta[hTheta + i], 1);
81  if(randGamma > 0) { allZeros = false; }
82 
83  P[hP + i] = randGamma;
84  gammaSum += randGamma;
85  }
86 
87  if (allZeros)
88  {
89  // Handle special case, occurs when params are really small
90  // because of numerical approximation around 0
91  P[hP + RandomGen::randIntRange_Uniform(0, (n - 1))] = 1.0;
92  }
93 
94  else if (gammaSum < 1e-300)
95  {
96  for (unsigned i = 0; i < n; i++) { P[hP + i] = 0; }
97  P[hP + RandomGen::randIntRange_Uniform(0, (n - 1))] = 1.0;
98  }
99 
100  else
101  {
102  //Normalize
103  for (unsigned int i = 0; i < n; ++i)
104  P[hP + i] = (P[hP + i] / gammaSum);
105  }
106 }
107 
108 void utils::statistics::sampleDirichlet(
109  const std::vector<double>& theta, std::vector<double>& P)
110 {
111  utils::statistics::sampleDirichlet(0, theta, 0, P, theta.size());
112 }
113 
114 std::vector<double> utils::statistics::sampleDirichlet(
115  const std::vector<double>& theta)
116 {
117  std::vector<double> P(theta.size());
118  utils::statistics::sampleDirichlet(theta, P);
119 
120  return P;
121 }

130 std::string utils::compression::compressStr(
131  const std::string& str, int compressionlevel) throw (std::runtime_error)
132 {
133  z_stream zs; // z_stream is zlib's control structure
134  memset(&zs, 0, sizeof(zs));
135 
136  if (deflateInit(&zs, compressionlevel) != Z_OK)
137  throw(std::runtime_error("deflateInit failed while compressing."));
138 
139  zs.next_in = (Bytef*)str.data();
140  zs.avail_in = str.size(); // set the z_stream's input
141 
142  int ret;
143  char outbuffer[32768];
144  std::string outstring;
145 
146  // retrieve the compressed bytes blockwise
147  do {
148  zs.next_out = reinterpret_cast<Bytef*>(outbuffer);
149  zs.avail_out = sizeof(outbuffer);
150 
151  ret = deflate(&zs, Z_FINISH);
152 
153  if (outstring.size() < zs.total_out) {
154  // append the block to the output string
155  outstring.append(outbuffer,
156  zs.total_out - outstring.size());
157  }
158  } while (ret == Z_OK);
159 
160  deflateEnd(&zs);
161 
162  if (ret != Z_STREAM_END) { // an error occurred that was not EOF
163  std::ostringstream oss;
164  oss << "Exception during zlib compression: (" << ret << ") " << zs.msg;
165  throw(std::runtime_error(oss.str()));
166  }
167 
168  return outstring;
169 }
170 
171 
172 std::string utils::compression::uncompressStr(const std::string& str)
173  throw (std::runtime_error)
174 {
175  z_stream zs; // z_stream is zlib's control structure
176  memset(&zs, 0, sizeof(zs));
177 
178  if (inflateInit(&zs) != Z_OK)
179  throw(std::runtime_error("inflateInit failed while decompressing."));
180 
181  zs.next_in = (Bytef*)str.data();
182  zs.avail_in = str.size();
183 
184  int ret;
185  char outbuffer[32768];
186  std::string outstring;
187 
188  // get the decompressed bytes blockwise using repeated calls to inflate
189  do {
190  zs.next_out = reinterpret_cast<Bytef*>(outbuffer);
191  zs.avail_out = sizeof(outbuffer);
192 
193  ret = inflate(&zs, 0);
194 
195  if (outstring.size() < zs.total_out) {
196  outstring.append(outbuffer,
197  zs.total_out - outstring.size());
198  }
199 
200  } while (ret == Z_OK);
201 
202  inflateEnd(&zs);
203 
204  if (ret != Z_STREAM_END) { // an error occurred that was not EOF
205  std::ostringstream oss;
206  oss << "Exception during zlib decompression: (" << ret << ") "
207  << zs.msg;
208  throw(std::runtime_error(oss.str()));
209  }
210 
211  return outstring;
212 }

221 std::string utils::parsing::getValue(int argc, char* argv[], std::string opt)
222  throw (ParsingException)
223 {
224  for (int i = 1; i < (argc - 1); ++i)
225  if (std::string(argv[i]) == opt) { return std::string(argv[i + 1]); }
226 
227  throw parsing::ParsingException(opt);
228 }
229 
230 
231 std::vector<std::string> utils::parsing::getValues(int argc, char* argv[],
232  std::string opt, unsigned int n) throw (ParsingException)
233 {
234  std::vector<std::string> values;
235  for (int i = 1; i < (argc - (int) n); ++i)
236  {
237  if (std::string(argv[i]) == opt)
238  {
239  for (int j = 1; j <= (int) n; ++j)
240  values.push_back(std::string(argv[i + j]));
241  break;
242  }
243  }
244  if (values.size() == n) { return values; }
245 
246  throw parsing::ParsingException(opt);
247 }
248 
249 
250 bool utils::parsing::hasFlag(int argc, char* argv[], std::string opt)
251 {
252  for (int i = 1; i < argc; ++i)
253  if (std::string(argv[i]) == opt) { return true; }
254 
255  return false;
256 }
